forms.description: Submit a maintenance request for a facility issue

params.name: location
params.description: The location requiring maintenance (e.g., building, floor, room number).

params.name: issueType
params.description: The type of maintenance issue.

params.name: urgency
params.description: The urgency level of the request.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional details about the issue and any relevant circumstances.

forms.description: Book a meeting room or facility

params.name: roomId
params.description: The ID or name of the room to book.

params.name: date
params.description: The date for the booking (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD).

params.name: startTime
params.description: The start time for the booking (e.g., HH:MM).

params.name: endTime
params.description: The end time for the booking (e.g., HH:MM).

params.name: attendees
params.description: The number of attendees.

params.name: purpose
params.description: Purpose of the meeting and any special requirements or setup needed.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional details about the booking request and any specific requirements.

forms.description: Request cleaning services for a specific area or issue

params.name: location
params.description: The specific location requiring cleaning.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional details about the cleaning request and any specific requirements.

forms.description: Request office supplies

params.name: itemRequested
params.description: The name or description of the item being requested.

params.name: quantity
params.description: The quantity of the item requested.

params.name: component
params.description: The component requesting the supplies.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context about why the supplies are needed and any specific requirements.

forms.description: Register an upcoming visitor for building access

params.name: visitorName
params.description: Full name of the visitor.

params.name: visitorCompany
params.description: Company the visitor represents.

params.name: visitDate
params.description: Date of the visit (YYYY-MM-DD).

params.name: visitTime
params.description: Time of arrival (e.g., HH:MM).

params.name: hostEmployeeName
params.description: Name of the employee hosting the visitor.

params.name: purpose
params.description: Purpose of the visit or any other details.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional details about the visitor registration request and any specific requirements.

forms.description: Request new furniture or the repair of existing furniture

params.name: requestType
params.description: Is this a request for new furniture or a repair?

params.name: item
params.description: Type of furniture (e.g., office chair, standing desk).

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional details about the request or the issue.

params.name: urgency
params.description: The urgency level of the request.

forms.description: Request a new or replacement key or access card

params.name: requestType
params.description: The type of request.

params.name: keyOrCardNumber
params.description: The number of the key or card, if applicable.

params.name: location
params.description: The door or area for which access is needed.

params.name: reason
params.description: Justification for the request.

forms.description: Report a pest problem in the office

params.name: location
params.description: Specific location of the pest sighting.

params.name: pestType
params.description: Type of pest, if known.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Detailed description of the issue.

forms.description: Report an issue with a vending or coffee machine

params.name: machineId
params.description: The ID number or location of the machine.

params.name: issueType
params.description: The type of issue.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional details about the problem.

forms.description: Request assistance with moving desks or offices

params.name: currentLocation
params.description: Your current desk or office number.

params.name: newLocation
params.description: Your new desk or office number.

params.name: moveDate
params.description: The desired date for the move.

params.name: itemsToMove
params.description: List of items that need to be moved (e.g., computer, files, personal items).

forms.description: Report a safety hazard in the workplace

params.name: location
params.description: Exact location of the hazard.

params.name: hazardType
params.description: Type of hazard (e.g., wet floor, exposed wire).

params.name: userComments
params.description: Detailed description of the hazard.

params.name: urgency
params.description: How urgent is this hazard?

forms.description: Request a parking permit or report a parking lot issue

params.name: requestType
params.description: The type of parking request.

params.name: vehicleInfo
params.description: Your vehicle make, model, and license plate (for new permits).

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional details about the parking request and any specific requirements.

forms.description: Request setup assistance for a special event

params.name: eventName
params.description: Name of the event.

params.name: date
params.description: Date of the event.

params.name: time
params.description: Start and end time of the event.

params.name: location
params.description: Location of the event.

params.name: setupRequirements
params.description: Detailed list of setup needs (e.g., number of tables, chairs, layout).

forms.description: Request an ergonomic assessment of your workstation

params.name: location
params.description: Your desk or office location.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Describe the discomfort or issues you are experiencing.

forms.description: Submit a request for time off

params.name: startDate
params.description: Start date of the time off (YYYY-MM-DD).

params.name: endDate
params.description: End date of the time off (YYYY-MM-DD).

params.name: timeOffType
params.description: Type of time off requested.

params.name: reason
params.description: Optional reason for the request.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context about the time off request and any relevant details.

forms.description: Update personal employee information

params.name: fieldToUpdate
params.description: Which information to update.

params.name: newValue
params.description: The new value for the selected field.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context about the information update and any relevant details.

forms.description: Ask a question about employee benefits

params.name: benefitType
params.description: Type of benefit to inquire about.

params.name: question
params.description: Specific question about the benefit.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context about your benefits inquiry and any specific concerns.

forms.description: Report an issue with a paycheck

params.name: payPeriodEndDate
params.description: End date of the pay period in question (YYYY-MM-DD).

params.name: userComments
params.description: Description of the payroll issue.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context about the payroll issue and any relevant details.

forms.description: Ask a question about a specific HR policy

params.name: policyTopic
params.description: The HR policy topic you have a question about.

params.name: question
params.description: Your specific question regarding the policy.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context about your policy question and any specific concerns.

forms.description: Request a letter verifying employment

params.name: recipientName
params.description: Name of the person or organization receiving the letter.

params.name: recipientAddress
params.description: Address of the recipient.

params.name: includeSalary
params.description: Whether to include salary information in the letter.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Any additional details or specific requirements for the letter.

forms.description: Request to enroll in a training course or program

params.name: courseName
params.description: The name of the course or program.

params.name: provider
params.description: The organization or platform offering the training.

params.name: businessJustification
params.description: How this training will benefit your role and the company.

params.name: cost
params.description: The cost of the training, if known.

forms.description: Request to open a new job requisition

params.name: jobTitle
params.description: The title for the new position.

params.name: component
params.description: The component where the new hire will work.

params.name: jobDescription
params.description: A detailed description of the roles and responsibilities.

params.name: managerName
params.description: The name of the hiring manager.

forms.description: Report an employee relations issue, such as a conflict

params.name: dateOfIncident
params.description: The date the incident occurred.

params.name: involvedParties
params.description: Names of the people involved.

params.name: userComments
params.description: A confidential, detailed description of the incident.

params.name: desiredOutcome
params.description: What you would like to see happen as a result of this report.

forms.description: Request a copy of a tax form like a W-2

params.name: formType
params.description: The type of tax form you are requesting.

params.name: year
params.description: The tax year you are requesting the form for.

forms.description: Update your direct deposit banking information

params.name: bankName
params.description: The name of your bank.

params.name: routingNumber
params.description: Your bank's routing number.

params.name: accountNumber
params.description: Your bank account number.

forms.description: Request a workplace accommodation

params.name: natureOfDisability
params.description: A description of the condition requiring accommodation.

params.name: requestedAccommodation
params.description: The specific accommodation you are requesting.

params.name: medicalDocumentationAttached
params.description: Confirm if you are attaching medical documentation.

forms.description: Submit a request for an approved reimbursement

params.name: expenseType
params.description: The category of the expense.

params.name: amount
params.description: The total amount to be reimbursed.

params.name: date
params.description: The date of the expense.

params.name: userComments
params.description: A brief description of the expense.

params.name: receiptAttached
params.description: Confirm that you have attached a receipt.

forms.description: Refer a candidate for a job opening

params.name: candidateName
params.description: The full name of the candidate you are referring.

params.name: candidateResume
params.description: Link to the candidate's resume or attach it.

params.name: referredForPosition
params.description: The job title or requisition ID you are referring them for.

forms.description: Report a work-related injury and start a claim

params.name: dateOfInjury
params.description: The date the injury occurred.

params.name: locationOfInjury
params.description: Where the injury occurred.

params.name: userComments
params.description: A detailed account of how the injury happened.

params.name: witnesses
params.description: Names of any witnesses, if applicable.

forms.description: Report an issue with a piece of IT hardware

params.name: assetTag
params.description: The asset tag of the affected hardware.

params.name: hardwareType
params.description: Type of hardware experiencing an issue.

params.name: printerModel
params.description: The model of the printer (e.g., Dell, HP, etc.).

params.name: printerIssueType
params.description: The type of printer issue.

params.name: userComments
params.description: A detailed description of the hardware issue.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context about the hardware issue and any relevant details.

forms.description: Report an issue with a software application

params.name: softwareName
params.description: The name of the software experiencing an issue.

params.name: softwareVersion
params.description: The version of the software, if known.

params.name: operatingSystem
params.description: The operating system you are using (e.g., Windows 10, macOS Sonoma).

params.name: userComments
params.description: A detailed description of the software issue, including steps to reproduce if possible.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context about the software issue and any relevant details.

forms.description: Request access to a new software, system, or shared resource

params.name: resourceName
params.description: Name of the software, system, or shared drive you need access to.

params.name: justification
params.description: Reason for needing access to this resource.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context about your access request and any specific requirements.

forms.description: Report a network connectivity problem

params.name: location
params.description: Your current location (e.g., office building, floor, remote).

params.name: problemType
params.description: The type of network problem.

params.name: userComments
params.description: A detailed description of the network problem.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context about the network problem and any relevant details.

forms.description: Request a laptop for a new employee

params.name: specialRequirements
params.description: Any special requirements or specifications needed for the role.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context about the laptop request and any specific requirements.

forms.description: Request new IT hardware for an existing employee

params.name: hardwareType
params.description: The type of hardware being requested.

params.name: justification
params.description: Reason for the hardware request (e.g., replacement for broken item, upgrade for performance).

params.name: userComments
params.description: Additional context or specific model requests.

forms.description: Request the purchase of a new software application for your team or component

params.name: softwareName
params.description: The name of the software to be purchased.

params.name: website
params.description: Link to the software's official website.

params.name: businessCase
params.description: Business justification for purchasing this software.

params.name: numberOfUsers
params.description: How many users will need this software.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Any other relevant information.

forms.description: Reset your password for an application or system

params.name: application
params.description: The name of the application or system you are locked out of.

params.name: username
params.description: Your username for that application.

forms.description: Request to have approved software installed on your computer

params.name: softwareName
params.description: The name of the software you need installed.

params.name: justification
params.description: Briefly explain why you need this software for your role.

params.name: computerAssetTag
params.description: The asset tag of the computer where the software should be installed.

forms.description: Report that your computer is running slowly

params.name: deviceType
params.description: The type of device that is slow.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Describe the performance issue (e.g., when does it happen, what applications are running).

params.name: troubleshootingStepsTaken
params.description: What steps have you already taken to resolve the issue (e.g., rebooting)?

forms.description: Report a security incident, such as a phishing email or malware

params.name: incidentType
params.description: The type of security incident.

params.name: userComments
params.description: A detailed description of the incident.

forms.description: Request a data backup or to restore files from a backup

params.name: requestType
params.description: Are you requesting a backup or a restore?

params.name: filePath
params.description: The full path of the file or folder to be backed up or restored.

params.name: date
params.description: For restores, the date you want to restore the files from.

params.name: reason
params.description: The reason for the request.

forms.description: Request all necessary IT resources for a new hire

params.name: newHireName
params.description: The full name of the new employee.

params.name: startDate
params.description: The new employee's start date.

params.name: managerName
params.description: The name of the new hire's manager.

params.name: requiredHardware
params.description: List the required hardware (e.g., laptop, monitor, keyboard).

params.name: requiredSoftware
params.description: List all software applications the new hire will need access to.

forms.description: Deactivate accounts and access for a departing employee

params.name: employeeName
params.description: The full name of the departing employee.

params.name: lastDay
params.description: The employee's last day of employment.

params.name: managerName
params.description: The name of the departing employee's manager.

forms.description: Request temporary loaner equipment

params.name: equipmentType
params.description: The type of equipment you need.

params.name: justification
params.description: Why you need the loaner equipment (e.g., yours is being repaired).

params.name: returnDate
params.description: The expected date you will return the equipment.

forms.description: Get help with a mobile device (phone or tablet)

params.name: deviceModel
params.description: The model of your device (e.g., iPhone 15, Samsung Galaxy S23).

params.name: osVersion
params.description: The operating system version, if known.

params.name: userComments
params.description: Describe the issue you are having with your mobile device.
